tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    humidity DECIMAL,
    wind_speed DECIMAL,
    precipitation DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(50),
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  wind_speed FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumption (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(50),
  usage FLOAT,
  time_stamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ForecastData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(50),
  predicted_energy FLOAT,
  prediction_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Utilities (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  utility_name VARCHAR(50),
  address VARCHAR(100),
  contact_person VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    temperature FLOAT NOT NULL,
    humidity FLOAT NOT NULL,
    wind_speed FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    consumption FLOAT NOT NULL,
    prediction FLOAT NOT NULL,
    error FLOAT
);
